original_text: But David said to Saul, “Your servant has been keeping his father’s sheep. When a lion or a bear came and carried off a sheep from the flock,
korean_text: 다윗이 사울에게 말하되 주의 종이 아버지의 양을 지킬 때에 사자나 곰이 와서 양 떼에서 새끼를 물어가면

sentences.original_text: Your servant has been keeping his father's sheep.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 종이 아버지의 양을 지키고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: When a lion or a bear came
and carried off a sheep from the flock,
